title: Will the Immortal Journey skins be available in the "Your Shop"?
body:
The Your Shop FAQ states that "Champions or skins released within the last 90 days" will not be included in your shop but, the Immortal Journey skins will be 102 days old when the Shop closes. Right now the skins are only 74 days old and the Your Shop event goes on for 28 days and that equals 102. 

I hope they are, it could give a large amount of profit to Riot and it would make my day ðŸ˜Š

replies.body: They will have to have been released for a grand total of 90 days *when the shop opens* most likely, otherwise, they probably won't have a chance of appearing. With that being said, there's no guarantee that you'd get those in your shop either as it's based on champions played with a bit of rng as well.
